means: （姓氏） 兰伯特 （物） 朗伯（亮度单位）

word_mean: 〔Johann Heinrich Lambert，德国数学家和物理学家，1728～1777〕朗伯：亮度单位，等于一个完全的漫射体每平方厘米发射1流明(lumen)的亮度，通常应用此单位的千分之一，称毫朗伯(millilambert)。如选用面积为1平方英尺，则此单位称1英尺朗伯(foot lambert)

sentence.Network_en: Lambert gave Luckwell a hefty shove to send him on his way.
sentence.Network_cn: 兰伯特用力推了勒克韦尔一把，把他送上了路。

sentence.Network_en: He should consider offering up a prayer to St Lambert.
sentence.Network_cn: 他应当考虑向圣朗贝尔祷告。

sentence.Network_en: J . H . Lambert initiated a new epoch in the theoretical cartography.
sentence.Network_cn: 兰伯特在理论制图学方面开创了一个新纪元.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 朗伯（lambert）(Lambert)定律阐述为：光被透明介质吸收的比例与入射光的强度无关；在光程上每等厚层介质吸收相同比例值的光。目录开放分 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: named after Johann H. Lambert (1728–77), German physicist

means.word_mean: 1. a cgs unit of illumination equal to the brightness of a perfectly diffusing surface that emits or reflects one lumen per square centimeter
